This move inflicts physical or special damage, whichever will be more effective. This may also poison the target.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.
This move is either physical or special—whichever will inflict more damage. This may also poison the target.

mistyexplosion.name: Misty Explosion
descriptions:
The user attacks everything around it and faints upon using this move. This move's power is increased on Misty Terrain.
This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
The user attacks everything around it and faints upon using this move. This move's power is boosted on Misty Terrain.

grassyglide.name: Grassy Glide
descriptions:
Gliding on the ground, the user attacks the target. This move always goes first on Grassy Terrain.
This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

risingvoltage.name: Rising Voltage
descriptions:
The user attacks with electric voltage rising from the ground. This move's power doubles when the target is on Electric Terrain.
This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
The user attacks with electricity rising from the ground. This move's power is doubled if the target is on Electric Terrain.

terrainpulse.name: Terrain Pulse
descriptions:
The user utilizes the power of the terrain to attack. This move's type and power changes depending on the terrain when it's used.
This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
The user utilizes the energy of the terrain to attack. This move’s type and power change depending on the terrain at the time the move is used.

skittersmack.name: Skitter Smack
descriptions:
The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.
This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

burningjealousy.name: Burning Jealousy
descriptions:
The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn with a burn.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

lashout.name: Lash Out
descriptions:
The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. If its stats were lowered during the turn, the power of this move is doubled.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.
The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's stats were lowered during this turn.

poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
descriptions:
The user attacks the target by controlling the target's item. The move fails if the target doesn't have an item.
This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
The user attacks by controlling the target's item. This move fails if the target isn't holding an item.

corrosivegas.name: Corrosive Gas
descriptions:
The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items they hold.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.
The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items held by other Pokémon.

coaching.name: Coaching
descriptions:
The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.
This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

flipturn.name: Flip Turn
descriptions:
After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

tripleaxel.name: Triple Axel
descriptions:
A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.
This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

dualwingbeat.name: Dual Wingbeat
descriptions:
The user slams the target with its wings. The target is hit twice in a row.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.
The user slams the target with its wings to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

scorchingsands.name: Scorching Sands
descriptions:
The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack. This may also leave the target with a burn.
This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

junglehealing.name: Jungle Healing
descriptions:
The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP and healing any status conditions of itself and its ally Pokémon in battle.
This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

wickedblow.name: Wicked Blow
descriptions:
The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.
This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This move always lands a critical hit.

surgingstrikes.name: Surging Strikes
descriptions:
The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This attack always results in a critical hit.
This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

thundercage.name: Thunder Cage
descriptions:

This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.
The user traps the target inside a cage of sparking electricity that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

dragonenergy.name: Dragon Energy
descriptions:
Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.
This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

freezingglare.name: Freezing Glare
descriptions:
The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack. This may also leave the target frozen.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

fierywrath.name: Fiery Wrath
descriptions:
The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

thunderouskick.name: Thunderous Kick
descriptions:
The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

glaciallance.name: Glacial Lance
descriptions:
The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

astralbarrage.name: Astral Barrage
descriptions:
The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

eeriespell.name: Eerie Spell
descriptions:
The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power. This also removes 3 PP from the target's last move.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.
The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power. This also drains 3 PP from the move last used by the target.

direclaw.name: Dire Claw
descriptions:
The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws, aiming to land a critical hit. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or drowsy.
The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws, aiming to land a critical hit. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or asleep.*The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or asleep.*

psyshieldbash.name: Psyshield Bash
descriptions:
Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This may also raise the user’s defensive stats.
Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This also boosts the user’s Defense stat.

powershift.name: Power Shift
descriptions:
The user swaps its offensive and defensive stats.
The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats.

stoneaxe.name: Stone Axe
descriptions:
The user swings its stone axes at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Stone splinters left behind by this attack continue to damage the target for several turns.
The user swings its stone axes at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Stone splinters left behind by this attack float around the target.*The user swings its stone axes at the target. Stone splinters left behind by this attack float around the target.*

springtidestorm.name: Springtide Storm
descriptions:
The user attacks by wrapping the target in fierce winds brimming with love and hate. This move’s additional effects depend on the user’s form.
The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in fierce winds brimming with love and hate. This may also lower their Attack stats.

mysticalpower.name: Mystical Power
descriptions:
The user strengthens itself with a mysterious power. If it excels in offense, its offensive stats are raised. If it excels in defense, its defensive stats are raised.
The user attacks by emitting a mysterious power. This also boosts the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

ragingfury.name: Raging Fury
descriptions:
The user rampages and spews vicious flames to inflict damage on the target, then becomes fixated on using this move.
The user rampages around spewing flames for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

wavecrash.name: Wave Crash
descriptions:
The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user and raises the user’s action speed.
The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot.

chloroblast.name: Chloroblast
descriptions:
The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user and lowers the user's action speed.
The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user.

mountaingale.name: Mountain Gale
descriptions:
The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target to inflict damage.
The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target to inflict damage. This may also make the target flinch.

victorydance.name: Victory Dance
descriptions:
The user performs a dance to usher in victory. This raises the user’s offensive and defensive stats and increases the damage dealt by the user’s moves by 50 percent.
The user performs an intense dance to usher in victory, boosting its Attack, Defense, and Speed stats.

headlongrush.name: Headlong Rush
descriptions:
The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user’s defensive stats.
The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

barbbarrage.name: Barb Barrage
descriptions:
The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move’s power is doubled if the target has a status condition.
The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move’s power is doubled if the target is already poisoned.

esperwing.name: Esper Wing
descriptions:
The user slashes the target with aura-enriched wings. This also raises the user's action speed. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
The user slashes the target with aura-enriched wings. This also boosts the user's Speed stat. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

bittermalice.name: Bitter Malice
descriptions:
The user attacks its target with spine-chilling resentment. This may also leave the target with frostbite. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.
The user attacks the target with spine-chilling resentment. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

shelter.name: Shelter
descriptions:
The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, raising its defensive stats. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.
The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

triplearrows.name: Triple Arrows
descriptions:
The user delivers an axe kick, then fires three arrows. This raises the chance of its future attacks landing critical hits and also lowers the target's defensive stats.
The user kicks, then fires three arrows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also lower the target’s Defense stat or make it flinch.

infernalparade.name: Infernal Parade
descriptions: The user attacks with myriad fireballs. This may also leave the target with a burn. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

ceaselessedge.name: Ceaseless Edge
descriptions:
The user slashes its shell blade at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Shell splinters left behind by this attack will continue to damage the target for several turns.
The user slashes its shell blade at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Shell splinters left behind by this attack remain scattered under the target as spikes.*The user slashes its shell blade at the target. Shell splinters left behind by this attack remain scattered under the target as spikes.*

bleakwindstorm.name: Bleakwind Storm
descriptions:
The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. This may also leave the target with frostbite.
The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. This may also lower the Speed stats of opposing Pokémon.

wildboltstorm.name: Wildbolt Storm
descriptions:
The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave opposing Pokémon with paralysis.

sandsearstorm.name: Sandsear Storm
descriptions:
The user attacks by wrapping the target in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. This also leaves the target with a burn.
The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. This may also leave them with a burn.

lunarblessing.name: Lunar Blessing
descriptions:
The user heals its own status conditions and restores its HP. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.
The user receives a blessing from the crescent moon, restoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

takeheart.name: Take Heart
descriptions:
The user lifts its spirits, healing its own status conditions and raising its offensive and defensive stats.
The user lifts its spirits, curing its own status conditions and boosting its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

silktrap.name: Silk Trap
descriptions: The user spins a silken trap, protecting itself from damage while lowering the Speed stat of any attacker that makes direct contact.

axekick.name: Axe Kick
descriptions: The user attacks by kicking up into the air and slamming its heel down upon the target. This may also confuse the target. If it misses, the user takes damage instead.

lastrespects.name: Last Respects
descriptions: The user attacks to avenge its allies. The more defeated allies there are in the user's party, the greater the move's power.

luminacrash.name: Lumina Crash
descriptions: The user attacks by unleashing a peculiar light that even affects the mind. This also harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

orderup.name: Order Up
descriptions: The user attacks with elegant poise. If the user has a Tatsugiri in its mouth, this move boosts one of the user's stats based on the Tatsugiri's form.

jetpunch.name: Jet Punch
descriptions: The user summons a torrent around its fist and punches at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

spicyextract.name: Spicy Extract
descriptions: The user emits an incredibly spicy extract, sharply boosting the target's Attack stat and harshly lowering the target's Defense stat.

spinout.name: Spin Out
descriptions: The user spins furiously by straining its legs, inflicting damage on the target. This also harshly lowers the user's Speed stat.

populationbomb.name: Population Bomb
descriptions: The user’s fellows gather in droves to perform a combo attack that hits the target one to ten times in a row.

icespinner.name: Ice Spinner
descriptions: The user covers its feet in thin ice and twirls around, slamming into the target. This move's spinning motion also destroys the terrain.

glaiverush.name: Glaive Rush
descriptions: The user throws its entire body into a reckless charge. Attacks from opposing Pokémon during the next turn cannot miss and will inflict double damage.*The user throws its entire body into a reckless charge. After this move is used, attacks on the user cannot miss and will inflict double damage until the user’s next turn.*

revivalblessing.name: Revival Blessing
descriptions: The user bestows a loving blessing, reviving a party Pokémon that has fainted and restoring half that Pokémon's max HP.

saltcure.name: Salt Cure
descriptions: The user salt cures the target, inflicting damage every turn. Steel and Water types are more strongly affected by this move.

tripledive.name: Triple Dive
descriptions: The user performs a perfectly timed triple dive, hitting the target with splashes of water three times in a row.

mortalspin.name: Mortal Spin
descriptions: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also poisons opposing Pokémon.

doodle.name: Doodle
descriptions: The user captures the very essence of the target in a sketch. This changes the Abilities of the user and its ally Pokémon to that of the target.

filletaway.name: Fillet Away
descriptions: The user sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats by using its own HP.

kowtowcleave.name: Kowtow Cleave
descriptions: The user slashes at the target after kowtowing to make the target let down its guard. This attack never misses.

flowertrick.name: Flower Trick
descriptions: The user throws a rigged bouquet of flowers at the target. This attack never misses and always lands a critical hit.

torchsong.name: Torch Song
descriptions: The user blows out raging flames as if singing a song, scorching the target. This also boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

aquastep.name: Aqua Step
descriptions: The user toys with the target and attacks it using light and fluid dance steps. This also boosts the user's Speed stat.

ragingbull.name: Raging Bull
descriptions: The user performs a tackle like a raging bull. This move's type depends on the user's form. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

makeitrain.name: Make It Rain
descriptions: The user attacks by throwing out a mass of coins. This also lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat. Money is earned after the battle.

psyblade.name: Psyblade
descriptions: The user rends the target with an ethereal blade. This move's power is boosted by 50 percent if the user is on Electric Terrain.

hydrosteam.name: Hydro Steam
descriptions: The user blasts the target with boiling-hot water. This move's power is not lowered in harsh sunlight but rather boosted by 50 percent.

ruination.name: Ruination
descriptions: The user summons a ruinous disaster. This cuts the target’s HP in half.

collisioncourse.name: Collision Course
descriptions: The user transforms and crashes to the ground, causing a massive prehistoric explosion. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it’s a supereffective hit.

electrodrift.name: Electro Drift
descriptions: The user races forward at ultrafast speeds, piercing its target with futuristic electricity. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it's a supereffective hit.

shedtail.name: Shed Tail
descriptions: The user creates a substitute for itself using its own HP before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

chillyreception.name: Chilly Reception
descriptions: The user tells a chillingly bad joke before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting. This summons a snowstorm lasting five turns.

tidyup.name: Tidy Up
descriptions: The user tidies up and removes the effects of Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, Toxic Spikes, and Substitute. This also boosts the user’s Attack and Speed stats.

snowscape.name: Snowscape
descriptions: The user summons a snowstorm lasting five turns. This boosts the Defense stats of Ice types.

pounce.name: Pounce
descriptions: The user attacks by pouncing on the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

trailblaze.name: Trailblaze
descriptions: The user attacks suddenly as if leaping out from tall grass. The user's nimble footwork boosts its Speed stat.

chillingwater.name: Chilling Water
descriptions: The user attacks the target by showering it with water that's so cold it saps the target's power. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

hyperdrill.name: Hyper Drill
descriptions: The user spins the pointed part of its body at high speed to pierce the target. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

twinbeam.name: Twin Beam
descriptions: The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

ragefist.name: Rage Fist
descriptions: The user converts its rage into energy to attack. The more times the user has been hit by attacks, the greater the move's power.

armorcannon.name: Armor Cannon
descriptions: The user shoots its own armor out as blazing projectiles. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

bitterblade.name: Bitter Blade
descriptions: The user focuses its bitter feelings toward the world of the living into a slashing attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

doubleshock.name: Double Shock
descriptions: The user discharges all the electricity from its body to perform a high-damage attack. After using this move, the user will no longer be Electric type.

gigatonhammer.name: Gigaton Hammer
descriptions: The user swings its whole body around to attack with its huge hammer. This move can't be used twice in a row.

comeuppance.name: Comeuppance
descriptions: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

aquacutter.name: Aqua Cutter
descriptions: The user expels pressurized water to cut at the target like a blade. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

bloodmoon.name: Blood Moon
descriptions: The user unleashes the full brunt of its spirit from a full moon that shines as red as blood. This move can't be used twice in a row.

matchagotcha.name: Matcha Gotcha
descriptions: The user fires a blast of tea that it mixed. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

syrupbomb.name: Syrup Bomb
descriptions: The user sets off an explosion of sticky candy syrup, which coats the target and causes the target's Speed stat to drop each turn for three turns.

ivycudgel.name: Ivy Cudgel
descriptions: The user strikes with an ivy-wrapped cudgel. This move's type changes depending on the mask worn by the user, and it has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

electroshot.name: Electro Shot
descriptions: The user gathers electricity on the first turn, boosting its Sp. Atk stat, then fires a high-voltage shot on the next turn. The shot will be fired immediately in rain.

terastarstorm.name: Tera Starstorm
descriptions: With the power of its crystals, the user bombards and eliminates the target. When used by Terapagos in its Stellar Form, this move damages all opposing Pokémon.

ficklebeam.name: Fickle Beam
descriptions: The user shoots a beam of light to inflict damage. Sometimes all the user's heads shoot beams in unison, doubling the move's power.

burningbulwark.name: Burning Bulwark
descriptions: The user’s intensely hot fur protects it from attacks and also burns any attacker that makes direct contact with it.

thunderclap.name: Thunderclap
descriptions: This move enables the user to attack first with a jolt of electricity. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

mightycleave.name: Mighty Cleave
descriptions: The user wields the light that has accumulated atop its head to cleave the target. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

tachyoncutter.name: Tachyon Cutter
descriptions: The user attacks by launching particle blades at the target twice in a row. This attack never misses.

hardpress.name: Hard Press
descriptions: The target is crushed with an arm, a claw, or the like to inflict damage. The more HP the target has left, the greater the move's power.

dragoncheer.name: Dragon Cheer
descriptions: The user raises its allies’ morale with a draconic cry so that their future attacks have a heightened chance of landing critical hits. This rouses Dragon types more.

alluringvoice.name: Alluring Voice
descriptions: The user attacks the target using its angelic voice. This also confuses the target if its stats have been boosted during the turn.

temperflare.name: Temper Flare
descriptions: Spurred by desperation, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.

supercellslam.name: Supercell Slam
descriptions: The user electrifies its body and drops onto the target to inflict damage. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

psychicnoise.name: Psychic Noise
descriptions: The user attacks the target with unpleasant sound waves. For two turns, the target is prevented from recovering HP through moves, Abilities, or held items.

upperhand.name: Upper Hand
descriptions: The user reacts to the target's movement and strikes with the heel of its palm, making the target flinch. This move fails if the target is not readying a priority move.

malignantchain.name: Malignant Chain
descriptions: The user pours toxins into the target by wrapping them in a toxic, corrosive chain. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.
